import styles from "../css/Main.module.css"; import hubaib from "../images/hubaib.jpg"; import hussain from "../images/hussain.jpeg"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; function Main() { const [retProduct, setRetProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(async () => { const getProducts = await fetch( "http://localhost:5000/products/get-home-products", { method: "GET", credentials: "include", } ); const data = await getProducts.json(); if (data) setRetProducts(data.products); }, []); return ( <>
